name: Magicians Curse
description: It has been almost 15 years since you began you training with The Master. The Master chose you to succeed him and learn his ways. Since you were a child, The Master has watched over you, teaching you everything that you know today. Our worlds are safe and with the magic of The Master we've lived in peace since time began. Recently, The Master has fallen ill and all is gone. His magic has been unleased into the village causing mystical creatures to spontaneously appear plauging all the realms. It is up to you child to restore justice! Soon you'll be given two choices, the destination a mystery. Travel through the worlds, slay the creatures. Earn money and develop yourself for the final battle. The people of our worlds are counting on you to save them.
